name: node-keyring
description: Bindings to native Mac/Linux/Windows password APIs

scripts.build-release:macos: cargo build --target=x86_64-apple-darwin --release && cargo build --target=aarch64-apple-darwin --release && lipo -create target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/libnode_keyring.dylib target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/libnode_keyring.dylib -output index.node
